alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 04 at 1:09AM MST until further notice by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Montana... Jefferson River near Three Forks affecting Broadwater and Gallatin Counties. Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. .An ice jam will cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. For the Jefferson River...including DCP-Twin Bridges, Three Forks... elevated river levels are forecast. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway, Logan... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Jefferson River near Three Forks. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying farm fields, roads, and small bridges adjacent to the river is expected or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM MST Monday, January 03 the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late Wednesday night at 100 AM MST.
